title: Add robots.txt and sitemap.xml to site root

requirements.text:
Create a robots.txt file at the website root so it is publicly accessible at https://verithos.io/robots.txt, with exactly the following contents:

User-agent: *
Allow: /

Sitemap: https://verithos.io/sitemap.xml

quotes:
Ето ти съдържанието на двата файла: "robots.txt":
User-agent: *
Allow: /

Sitemap: https://verithos.io/sitemap.xml

acceptanceCriteria: Requesting /robots.txt returns HTTP 200 and the file contents exactly match the user-provided text (including newlines).
The robots.txt file is served as a static file from the site root (not via a React route).

requirements.text:
Create a sitemap.xml file at the website root so it is publicly accessible at https://verithos.io/sitemap.xml, with exactly the following contents:

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<urlset xmlns="http://www.sitemaps.org/schemas/sitemap/0.9">
   <url>
      <loc>https://verithos.io/</loc>
      <lastmod>2026-02-17</lastmod>
      <changefreq>monthly</changefreq>
      <priority>1.0</priority>
   </url>
</urlset>
acceptanceCriteria: Requesting /sitemap.xml returns HTTP 200 and the file contents exactly match the user-provided XML (including indentation/newlines).
The sitemap.xml file is served as a static file from the site root (not via a React route).

constraints: Do not modify any files under frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, or anything under frontend/src/components/ui.
Do not change any existing UI design/layout/styling as part of this change; only add the two root SEO files.
nonGoals: Do not implement dynamic sitemap generation.
Do not add additional sitemap URLs beyond the single provided homepage URL.
Do not change existing meta tags, canonical URL, or other SEO settings outside adding these two files.
